channel.title: CVE Feed for 4D -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for 4D -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-4770|2024-08-02T07:37:59.774Z -- 4d -- 4d.exe
item.description: An uncontrolled search path element vulnerability has been found on 4D and 4D server Windows executables applications, affecting version 19 R8 100218. This vulnerability consists in a DLL hijacking by replacing x64 shfolder.dll in the installation path, causing an arbitrary code execution.
